parameter.name: path
parameter.description: Path to file or directory to delete

parameter.name: matchingPattern
parameter.description: Legacy pattern matching to use when deleting files

parameter.name: fileFilterType
parameter.description: Type of file filtering: regex or ant

parameter.name: includeFiles
parameter.description: Pattern for files to include in deletion

parameter.name: excludeFiles
parameter.description: Pattern for files to exclude from deletion

parameter.name: maxFileAge
parameter.description: Maximum age of files to include in deletion

parameter.name: maxRetries
parameter.description: The maximum number of retry attempts in case of a failure.

parameter.name: retryDelay
parameter.description: The delay between retry attempts in milliseconds.

parameter.name: responseVariable
parameter.description: The name of the variable to which the output should be stored.

parameter.name: overwriteBody
parameter.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the response of the operation.
